Pre-Game Insights: Gibraltar will be looking to do better than their last encounter where they faced a 4-0 defeat in Wrexham.
Scotland will be using this friendly match to test their players as they prepare for their Euros campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gibraltar has a record of played two, lost two with 12 goals against and one in favour against Scotland.
Gibraltar will face Wales after this match, which has seen its club status drop in recent years.
Others: Gibraltar will be looking to test its growing number of young players expected to take on new roles in the coming years.
Scotland has named their 28-man provisional EURO 2024 squad which includes uncapped players and 16 players under the age of 25.
